title: Rav Shalom Ber Sorotzkin Mourns
body: Rebbetzin Faiga Sorotzkin a”h passed away at Tel Hashomer Hospital. She was the mother of Rav Shalom Ber Sorotzkin, rosh yeshivas Ateres Shlomo, who leads a network of yeshivos, kollelim, and chinuch institutions in Eretz Yisroel.

title: Satmar Rebbe Visits Otisville
body: Satmar Rebbe Rav Aharon Teitelbaum brought comfort to Jewish inmates at Otisville Prison in New York, offering words of chizuk and solace to dozens of inmates serving their sentences.

title: Rabbi Simcha Felder Wins Big
body: Rabbi Simcha Felder wins re-election in Brooklyn's 44th District with 84.62% of the vote, crushing opponent Heshy Tischler.
